title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip') and start the export to zip file process.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message pops up. The error message states that there were problems encountered during export and specifically mentions the file with the same name in 'project2' as the issue.
EB: The export process should complete successfully without encountering any errors. The zip file should contain all the selected files, even if they have the same name but are located in different directories.
SR:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip').
4. Verify that the export process completes without any error messages.
5. Extract the files from the zip file and ensure that all files, including those with the same name in different directories, are present.
